biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.

Heidi Hudson Leick (born May 9, 1969) is an American actress, known for her role as Callisto in the TV series Xena: Warrior Princess. She is also a certified Yoga instructor and intuitive counselor at the Healing Heart Yoga Center.
